ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: The Joe rescue team meets up with the Sierra Gordo military and both sides discover the rebels are actually Blue Ninjas. Lola arrives in Sierra Gordo to help rescue her husband. The Joes being held in the mine and the hostages in the Terrordrome both make escape ploys, while Cobra takes over the Pit seemingly unopposed; Snake-Eyes and Scarlett arrive to retake the Pit.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:57:54. [CVDB435609] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:37:05. [Issue ID 1165643]
